title: ai_licia For TikTok Live
author: Mathieu Bayou
excerpt: ai_licia is your perfect co-host to help you with your community. ai_licia is there to engage, bring entertainment and help you build your community thanks to her customisable unique personalities, her cross platform memory, her ability to hear, write and speak.
